mapper.select: SELECT A.created_dt created_dt , A.created_user_id createdBy , A.modified_dt modified_dt , A.modified_user_id modifiedBy , (SELECT X.USER_NAME FROM COMUSER X WHERE X.USER_ID = A.CREATED_USER_ID) userName , A.fk_board fkBoard , A.PK_ARTICLE pkArticle , A.PPK_ARTICLE ppkArticle , A.TITLE title , A.contents contents , A.pwd pwd , 0 hitCount , 0 seq , 0 depth , true editable FROM GRWARTICLE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.FK_BOARD = #{data.fkBoard} ORDER BY A.PK_ARTICLE DESC limit ${pageable.size} + 1 offset ${pageable.page} * ${pageable.size}
